posts.content:
Hi,
Apologies maybe a dumb question but here goes..

If I have dropped spindles on a shortened 4" adjustable front beam, can I just replace my spindles with stock one and new shocks? Will this lift my front, I'm guessing by 2.5" is that the normal spindle height or is it more?

Also running beetle rear straight arms on a freeway flyer, if I just rotate my spring arms the required number of splines will this get it level? Then add new shocks...

I'm just wanting to go back "up" as much as reasonably possible, but just double checking this is what I need to do.?
Many thanks.
Mike
